cards.name: Baffling End
cards.text:
When Baffling End enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls with converted mana cost 3 or less.
When Baffling End leaves the battlefield, target opponent creates a 3/3 green Dinosaur creature token with trample.

cards.name: Bishop of Binding
cards.text:
When Bishop of Binding enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until Bishop of Binding leaves the battlefield.
Whenever Bishop of Binding attacks, target Vampire gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the power of the exiled card.

cards.flavor:
"No shadow remains for you to hide in."
—Caparocti Sunborn
cards.name: Blazing Hope
cards.text: Exile target creature with power greater than or equal to your life total.

cards.flavor:
"The sun creates, sustains, and consumes so it can create again."
—Caparocti Sunborn
cards.name: Cleansing Ray
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target Vampire.
• Destroy target enchantment.

cards.flavor: Cunning warriors and dim-witted beasts alike fall under the church's harsh judgment.
cards.name: Divine Verdict
cards.text: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature.

cards.flavor:
"Undefeated in battle, she is the shining future our empire deserves."
—Huatli
cards.name: Everdawn Champion
cards.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to Everdawn Champion.

cards.flavor: "We have come at last to this holiest of holy places. What was stolen from us long ago is ours once again."
cards.name: Exultant Skymarcher
cards.text: Flying

cards.flavor: Loyal to his queen, slave to his thirst.
cards.name: Famished Paladin
cards.text:
Famished Paladin doesn't untap during your untap step.
Whenever you gain life, untap Famished Paladin.

cards.name: Forerunner of the Legion
cards.text:
When Forerunner of the Legion enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Vampire card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.
Whenever another Vampire enters the battlefield under your control, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
"The music of blades against its silver armor merely inspires it to bellow more full-throated melodies."
—Huatli
cards.name: Imperial Ceratops
cards.text: Enrage — Whenever Imperial Ceratops is dealt damage, you gain 2 life.

cards.flavor: The Legion of Dusk sailed from Torrezon in search of glory, riches, and the Immortal Sun.
cards.name: Legion Conquistador
cards.text: When Legion Conquistador enters the battlefield, you may search your library for any number of cards named Legion Conquistador, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.

cards.flavor: "Your part in this fight is done, vampire. Get used to your thirst."
cards.name: Luminous Bonds
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

cards.flavor:
"Its rise is like the sun's, a beautiful beginning. Its descent is like the sun's, a frightful ending."
—Huatli
cards.name: Majestic Heliopterus
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Majestic Heliopterus attacks, another target Dinosaur you control gains flying until end of turn.

cards.flavor: "Should I fall, take up our standard and carry on. The Legion must always prevail."
cards.name: Martyr of Dusk
cards.text: When Martyr of Dusk dies, create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink.

cards.flavor: "The time of salvation is at hand. Dusk washes over the world, and the Legion will rise immortal!"
cards.name: Moment of Triumph
cards.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. You gain 2 life.

cards.flavor: For every wound there is a blessing; for every death, a reckoning.
cards.name: Paladin of Atonement
cards.text:
At the beginning of each upkeep, if you lost life last turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Paladin of Atonement.
When Paladin of Atonement dies, you gain life equal to its toughness.

cards.name: Pride of Conquerors
cards.text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. If you have the city's blessing, those creatures get +2/+2 until end of turn instead.

cards.name: Radiant Destiny
cards.text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
As Radiant Destiny enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1. As long as you have the city's blessing, they also have vigilance.

cards.flavor: The abundance of foes in Orazca means the raptors no longer need any orders.
cards.name: Raptor Companion

cards.flavor: For the Legion of Dusk, the Immortal Sun is a source of eternal life. When they reclaim it, they will no longer be forced to subsist on the blood of the wicked.
cards.name: Sanguine Glorifier
cards.text: When Sanguine Glorifier enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on another target Vampire you control.

cards.flavor: "I was born to glory."
cards.name: Skymarcher Aspirant
cards.text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
Skymarcher Aspirant has flying as long as you have the city's blessing.

cards.flavor:
"Cut the beasts out from under them and their strength is nothing."
—Vona of Iedo, Butcher of Magan
cards.name: Slaughter the Strong
cards.text: Each player chooses any number of creatures they control with total power 4 or less, then sacrifices all other creatures they control.

cards.flavor: They're fun to train—if you like stubborn, aggressive, and fiercely territorial.
cards.name: Snubhorn Sentry
cards.text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
Snubhorn Sentry gets +3/+0 as long as you have the city's blessing.

cards.flavor:
"Be still."
—Azor
cards.name: Sphinx's Decree
cards.text: Each opponent can't cast instant or sorcery spells during that player's next turn.

cards.name: Squire's Devotion
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has lifelink.
When Squire's Devotion enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink.

cards.flavor: "I will not sleep until Orazca is ours once more."
cards.name: Sun Sentinel
cards.text: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

cards.flavor:
"Pterodons tolerate no intrusion into their skies. Even the clouds must ask permission."
—Mahuiz, Sun Empire archer
cards.name: Sun-Crested Pterodon
cards.text:
Flying
Sun-Crested Pterodon has vigilance as long as you control another Dinosaur.

cards.flavor:
"Kinjalli sculpted humans from clay, but the dinosaurs were carved from unyielding stone."
—Itzama the Crested
cards.name: Temple Altisaur
cards.text: If a source would deal damage to another Dinosaur you control, prevent all but 1 of that damage.

cards.flavor:
"I would advise you not to struggle."
—Huatli
cards.name: Trapjaw Tyrant
cards.text: Enrage — Whenever Trapjaw Tyrant is dealt damage, exile target creature an opponent controls until Trapjaw Tyrant leaves the battlefield.

cards.flavor: The sky takes flight and the earth trembles.
cards.name: Zetalpa, Primal Dawn
cards.text: Flying, double strike, vigilance, trample, indestructible

cards.flavor: "Damn the cannons, mates. Charge!"
cards.name: Admiral's Order
cards.text:
Raid — If you attacked with a creature this turn, you may pay {U} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Counter target spell.

cards.name: Aquatic Incursion
cards.text:
When Aquatic Incursion enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 blue Merfolk creature tokens with hexproof. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
{3}{U}: Target Merfolk can't be blocked this turn.

cards.flavor: Possession is eleven-tenths of the pirate code.
cards.name: Crafty Cutpurse
cards.text:
Flash
When Crafty Cutpurse enters the battlefield, each token that would be created under an opponent's control this turn is created under your control instead.

cards.name: Crashing Tide
cards.text:
Crashing Tide has flash as long as you control a Merfolk.
Return target creature to its owner's hand.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Curious Obsession
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card."
At the beginning of your end step, if you didn't attack with a creature this turn, sacrifice Curious Obsession.

cards.flavor: "Up you go, you soggy rat."
cards.name: Deadeye Rig-Hauler
cards.text: Raid — When Deadeye Rig-Hauler enters the battlefield, if you attacked with a creature this turn, you may return target creature to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Expel from Orazca
cards.text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If you have the city's blessing, you may put that permanent on top of its owner's library instead.

cards.flavor: Jace tumbled down the waterfall and plunged deep into his past.
cards.name: Flood of Recollection
cards.text: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Flood of Recollection.

cards.flavor: Being a merciful pirate, she saved the vampire's gold from falling overboard.
cards.name: Hornswoggle
cards.text: Counter target creature spell. You create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color."

cards.name: Induced Amnesia
cards.text:
When Induced Amnesia enters the battlefield, target player exiles all cards from their hand face down, then draws that many cards.
When Induced Amnesia is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return the exiled cards to their owner's hand.

cards.flavor: "Why perch in the crow's nest when I can fly like the crows?"
cards.name: Kitesail Corsair
cards.text: Kitesail Corsair has flying as long as it's attacking.

cards.name: Kumena's Awakening
cards.text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, each player draws a card. If you have the city's blessing, instead only you draw a card.

cards.flavor: With matchless stealth, the River Heralds fought a running battle against the three enemy forces.
cards.name: Mist-Cloaked Herald
cards.text: Mist-Cloaked Herald can't be blocked.

cards.flavor: "As one, nature lifts its voice to tell you this: 'No.'"
cards.name: Negate
cards.text: Counter target noncreature spell.

cards.name: Nezahal, Primal Tide
cards.text:
Nezahal, Primal Tide can't be countered.
You have no maximum hand size.
Whenever an opponent casts a noncreature spell, draw a card.
Discard three cards: Exile Nezahal. Return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.flavor: "Here and gone like a fleeting breeze."
cards.name: Release to the Wind
cards.text: Exile target nonland permanent. For as long as that card remains exiled, its owner may cast it without paying its mana cost.

cards.flavor:
"Don't make splashes. Make progress."
—Tishana
cards.name: River Darter
cards.text: River Darter can't be blocked by Dinosaurs.

cards.flavor: "Time flows as the rivers do, toward an unknown sea. The wise know to look downstream."
cards.name: Riverwise Augur
cards.text: When Riverwise Augur enters the battlefield, draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

cards.flavor: The rising tide of Orazca's plunder lifted all ships.
cards.name: Sailor of Means
cards.text: When Sailor of Means enters the battlefield, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color."

cards.flavor: "When the waves pick up, either you find your feet or you lose your lunch."
cards.name: Sea Legs
cards.text:
Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +0/+2 as long as it's a Pirate. Otherwise, it gets -2/-0.

cards.flavor: Where the light falls dim and blue on broken ships, secrets lie unclaimed.
cards.name: Seafloor Oracle
cards.text: Whenever a Merfolk you control deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

cards.flavor: Stolen knowledge can never be stolen back.
cards.name: Secrets of the Golden City
cards.text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
Draw two cards. If you have the city's blessing, draw three cards instead.

cards.flavor: "If you keep to the shallows, you'll never learn the secrets of the depths."
cards.name: Silvergill Adept
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a Merfolk card from your hand or pay {3}.
When Silvergill Adept enters the battlefield, draw a card.

cards.flavor: "Prepare to be boarded."
cards.name: Siren Reaver
cards.text:
Raid — This spell costs {1} less to cast if you attacked with a creature this turn.
Flying

cards.flavor: "I'd rather be caught red-handed than leave empty-handed!"
cards.name: Slippery Scoundrel
cards.text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
As long as you have the city's blessing, Slippery Scoundrel has hexproof and can't be blocked.

cards.flavor: With Kumena in control of the Immortal Sun, the rapids rose from their riverbeds and the waterfalls took flight.
cards.name: Soul of the Rapids
cards.text:
Flying
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

cards.name: Spire Winder
cards.text:
Flying
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
Spire Winder gets +1/+1 as long as you have the city's blessing.

cards.flavor: For the River Heralds, the Immortal Sun is an object of terror and devastation. The idea that anyone would retrieve it for their own use is utterly abhorrent.
cards.name: Sworn Guardian
Timestream Navigator
cards.text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
{2}{U}{U}, {T}, Put Timestream Navigator on the bottom of its owner's library: Take an extra turn after this one. Activate this ability only if you have the city's blessing.

cards.name: Warkite Marauder
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Warkite Marauder attacks, target creature defending player controls loses all abilities and has base power and toughness 0/1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Waterknot
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Waterknot enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

cards.flavor: "It is impious to admit, but I do enjoy pirate blood. Something in the salty tang of it, the spice of rebellion."
cards.name: Arterial Flow
cards.text: Each opponent discards two cards. If you control a Vampire, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

cards.flavor: The first goblin tried to swim the canal. The second built a raft. The last and craftiest goblin launched herself from a firecannon and soared over the canal, trailing smoke. All were eaten, but only one was cooked.
cards.name: Canal Monitor

cards.flavor: "Drench these golden streets in the blood of our enemies."
cards.name: Champion of Dusk
cards.text: When Champion of Dusk enters the battlefield, you draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of Vampires you control.

cards.flavor: "Your mind is no longer yours to waste."
cards.name: Dark Inquiry
cards.text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

cards.name: Dead Man's Chest
cards.text:
Enchant creature an opponent controls
When enchanted creature dies, exile cards equal to its power from the top of its owner's library. You may cast nonland cards from among them for as long as they remain exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast those spells.

cards.flavor: "Aye, the foul beast chomped me, but I got away. You'd best believe when I find it again, it won't get away so easy."
cards.name: Dinosaur Hunter
cards.text: Whenever Dinosaur Hunter deals damage to a Dinosaur, destroy that creature.

cards.name: Dire Fleet Poisoner
cards.text:
Flash
Deathtouch
When Dire Fleet Poisoner enters the battlefield, target attacking Pirate you control gets +1/+1 and gains deathtouch until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Stories say demon blood runs in its veins, making it fearless and bloodthirsty.
cards.name: Dusk Charger
cards.text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
Dusk Charger gets +2/+2 as long as you have the city's blessing.

cards.flavor: Once they reached Orazca, the Legion's explorers ransacked tombs and temples, hunting for the Immortal Sun.
cards.name: Dusk Legion Zealot
cards.text: When Dusk Legion Zealot enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

cards.flavor: Without frequent raids, orcs sometimes get bored and plunder their own ships.
cards.name: Fathom Fleet Boarder
cards.text: When Fathom Fleet Boarder enters the battlefield, you lose 2 life unless you control another Pirate.

cards.name: Forerunner of the Coalition
cards.text:
When Forerunner of the Coalition enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Pirate card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.
Whenever another Pirate enters the battlefield under your control, each opponent loses 1 life.

cards.name: Golden Demise
cards.text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. If you have the city's blessing, instead only creatures your opponents control get -2/-2 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: "I can hear the plunder calling. It asks for me by name."
cards.name: Grasping Scoundrel
cards.text: Grasping Scoundrel gets +1/+0 as long as it's attacking.

cards.flavor:
"You were keen enough to sink your fangs into us, vampire! And now you're afraid of a few little nibbles?"
—Udvil "Ratty" Ratlock
cards.name: Gruesome Fate
cards.text: Each opponent loses 1 life for each creature you control.

cards.flavor: Never let the glitter of gold distract you from the gleam of steel in the shadows.
cards.name: Impale
cards.text: Destroy target creature.

cards.flavor: Another piece of a nefarious puzzle.
cards.name: Mastermind's Acquisition
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
• Choose a card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand.

cards.name: Mausoleum Harpy
cards.text:
Flying
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
Whenever another creature you control dies, if you have the city's blessing, put a +1/+1 counter on Mausoleum Harpy.

cards.flavor: "The time of condemnation is at hand. Dusk washes over the world, and I consign you to eternal darkness!"
cards.name: Moment of Craving
cards.text: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. You gain 2 life.

cards.flavor:
"My conquistadors are never slain, merely laid to rest."
—Queen Miralda the Pious
cards.name: Oathsworn Vampire
cards.text:
Oathsworn Vampire enters the battlefield tapped.
You may cast Oathsworn Vampire from your graveyard if you gained life this turn.

cards.flavor: "Shame to let good gold go to the grave."
cards.name: Pitiless Plunderer
cards.text: Whenever another creature you control dies, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color."

cards.flavor: Opening Orazca unleashed more horrors than just the Immortal Sun.
cards.name: Ravenous Chupacabra
cards.text: When Ravenous Chupacabra enters the battlefield, destroy target creature an opponent controls.

cards.flavor: Onora knew with sudden, grim certainty he would never see the Great River again.
cards.name: Reaver Ambush
cards.text: Exile target creature with power 3 or less.

cards.flavor:
"No more fear of death's oblivion—is this not the greatest treasure of all?"
—Gurezan, Legion resurrectionist
cards.name: Recover
cards.text:
Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
Draw a card.

cards.flavor: "I will catch you, child of the sun. I will drink your life and leave you a husk, discarded in the shadows."
cards.name: Sadistic Skymarcher
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a Vampire card from your hand or pay {1}.
Flying, lifelink

cards.name: Tetzimoc, Primal Death
cards.text:
Deathtouch
{B}, Reveal Tetzimoc, Primal Death from your hand: Put a prey counter on target creature. Activate this ability only during your turn.
When Tetzimoc enters the battlefield, destroy each creature your opponents control with a prey counter on it.

cards.name: Tomb Robber
cards.text:
Menace
{1}, Discard a card: Tomb Robber explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

cards.name: Twilight Prophet
cards.text:
Flying
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have the city's blessing, reveal the top card of your library and put it into your hand. Each opponent loses X life and you gain X life, where X is that card's converted mana cost.

cards.flavor:
"A thick fog obscures the port of Leor, but it's not thick enough to muffle the screams."
—Admiral Beckett Brass
cards.name: Vampire Revenant
cards.text: Flying

cards.name: Vona's Hunger
cards.text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
Each opponent sacrifices a creature. If you have the city's blessing, instead each opponent sacrifices half the creatures they control, rounded up.

cards.flavor: The purest devotion isn't the Blood Fast itself, but the craving that follows.
cards.name: Voracious Vampire
cards.text:
Menace
When Voracious Vampire enters the battlefield, target Vampire you control gets +1/+1 and gains menace until end of turn.

cards.flavor: As the struggle raged for control of the Immortal Sun, the world grew dark under a blood-red sky.
cards.name: Blood Sun
cards.text:
When Blood Sun enters the battlefield, draw a card.
All lands lose all abilities except mana abilities.

cards.flavor:
"Want to sink a ship? Blow a hole in the hull. Want to kill a regisaur? Same answer."
—Captain Brandis Thorn
cards.name: Bombard
cards.text: Bombard deals 4 damage to target creature.

cards.flavor:
"Why squabble for trinkets when we could be living large off all this gold?"
—Admiral Beckett Brass
cards.name: Brass's Bounty
cards.text: For each land you control, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color."

cards.flavor: Finders, keepers.
cards.name: Brazen Freebooter
cards.text: When Brazen Freebooter enters the battlefield, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color."

cards.flavor: Never underestimate the power of panache.
cards.name: Buccaneer's Bravado
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains first strike until end of turn.
• Target Pirate gets +1/+1 and gains double strike until end of turn.

cards.flavor: It doesn't hold grudges. It runs them down and impales them.
cards.name: Charging Tuskodon
cards.text:
Trample
If Charging Tuskodon would deal combat damage to a player, it deals double that damage to that player instead.

cards.flavor: No ancient lore ties the pirates of the Brazen Coalition to the Immortal Sun. But it's a powerful ancient artifact in a city of gold—what's not to covet?
cards.name: Daring Buccaneer
cards.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a Pirate card from your hand or pay {2}.

cards.name: Dire Fleet Daredevil
cards.text:
First strike
When Dire Fleet Daredevil enters the battlefield, exile target instant or sorcery card from an opponent's graveyard. You may cast that card this turn, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast that spell. If that card would be put into a graveyard this turn, exile it instead.

cards.flavor: The storm rages and the earth breaks.
cards.name: Etali, Primal Storm
cards.text: Whenever Etali, Primal Storm attacks, exile the top card of each player's library, then you may cast any number of nonland cards exiled this way without paying their mana costs.

cards.flavor:
"The Brazen Coalition is a firecannon pointed at our enemies. Goblins like him are the spark to its powder."
—Admiral Beckett Brass
cards.name: Fanatical Firebrand
cards.text:
Haste
{T}, Sacrifice Fanatical Firebrand: It deals 1 damage to any target.

cards.name: Forerunner of the Empire
cards.text:
When Forerunner of the Empire enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Dinosaur card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.
Whenever a Dinosaur enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Forerunner of the Empire deal 1 damage to each creature.

cards.name: Form of the Dinosaur
cards.text:
When Form of the Dinosaur enters the battlefield, your life total becomes 15.
At the beginning of your upkeep, Form of the Dinosaur deals 15 damage to target creature an opponent controls and that creature deals damage equal to its power to you.

cards.flavor: Nothing says trouble like a reedy hiss with a hint of liquid gurgle.
cards.name: Frilled Deathspitter
cards.text: Enrage — Whenever Frilled Deathspitter is dealt damage, it deals 2 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.

cards.flavor:
"Why are we following the goblin? Can he even read that map?"
—Daphne Vail, Diremore first mate
cards.name: Goblin Trailblazer
cards.text: Menace

cards.flavor: Pirate captains rarely enjoy a peaceful retirement.
cards.name: Mutiny
cards.text: Target creature an opponent controls deals damage equal to its power to another target creature that player controls.

cards.flavor: It hatches with its ferocity fully grown.
cards.name: Needletooth Raptor
cards.text: Enrage — Whenever Needletooth Raptor is dealt damage, it deals 5 damage to target creature an opponent controls.

cards.flavor:
"If you come across a raptor in the city, stay perfectly still. At least then you'll be well rested when you die."
—Captain Brandis Thorn
cards.name: Orazca Raptor

cards.flavor: Goblins can carry their body weight in loot.
cards.name: Pirate's Pillage
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards and create two colorless Treasure artifact tokens with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color."

cards.flavor: "Hard to starboard! Starb— Abandon ship! Abandon ship!"
cards.name: Reckless Rage
cards.text: Reckless Rage deals 4 damage to target creature you don't control and 2 damage to target creature you control.

cards.name: Rekindling Phoenix
cards.text:
Flying
When Rekindling Phoenix dies, create a 0/1 red Elemental creature token with "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this creature and return target card named Rekindling Phoenix from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste until end of turn."

cards.name: See Red
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+1 and has first strike.
At the beginning of your end step, if you didn't attack with a creature this turn, sacrifice See Red.

cards.flavor: A threefold calamity with a single will.
cards.name: Shake the Foundations
cards.text:
Shake the Foundations deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
Draw a card.

cards.flavor: Today it's a miracle of architecture, a marvel of stained glass, a symbol of the Legion's power. Tomorrow, driftwood.
cards.name: Shatter
cards.text: Destroy target artifact.

cards.flavor:
"Control them? No. I gird them in armor and let them loose."
—Yacha, Otepec huntmaster
cards.name: Silverclad Ferocidons
cards.text: Enrage — Whenever Silverclad Ferocidons is dealt damage, each opponent sacrifices a permanent.

cards.flavor: When the golden city opened, the dinosaurs inside were eager to greet the new visitors.
cards.name: Stampeding Horncrest
cards.text: Stampeding Horncrest has haste as long as you control another Dinosaur.

cards.flavor: "A bolt to the eye, a blade to the neck. That's the way to clear the deck!"
cards.name: Storm Fleet Swashbuckler
cards.text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
Storm Fleet Swashbuckler has double strike as long as you have the city's blessing.

cards.flavor:
"With Tilonalli's gifts, even the smallest of us can become great."
—Huatli
cards.name: Sun-Collared Raptor
cards.text:
Trample
{2}{R}: Sun-Collared Raptor gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: "I'm about to make you famous. From the golden city to High and Dry, they'll talk about how fast you died!"
cards.name: Swaggering Corsair
cards.text: Raid — Swaggering Corsair enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if you attacked with a creature this turn.

cards.name: Tilonalli's Crown
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Tilonalli's Crown enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature gets +3/+0 and has trample.

cards.name: Tilonalli's Summoner
cards.text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
Whenever Tilonalli's Summoner attacks, you may pay {X}{R}. If you do, create X 1/1 red Elemental creature tokens that are tapped and attacking. At the beginning of the next end step, exile those tokens unless you have the city's blessing.

cards.flavor: "Our lives, our homes, and all our history are at risk. Do not speak to me of peace."
cards.name: Aggressive Urge
cards.text:
Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Draw a card.

cards.flavor: When a cacophodon is angry, the whole jungle knows.
cards.name: Cacophodon
cards.text: Enrage — Whenever Cacophodon is dealt damage, untap target permanent.

cards.flavor: Despite its appearance, it's anything but defenseless.
cards.name: Cherished Hatchling
cards.text: When Cherished Hatchling dies, you may cast Dinosaur spells this turn as though they had flash, and whenever you cast a Dinosaur spell this turn, it gains "When this creature enters the battlefield, you may have it fight another target creature."

cards.flavor:
"Remember when it was the most terrifying thing you'd ever seen?"
—Captain Lannery Storm
cards.name: Colossal Dreadmaw
cards.text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

cards.flavor:
"Our survival, like theirs, depends on our ability to work together."
—Huatli, to Tishana
cards.name: Crested Herdcaller
cards.text:
Trample
When Crested Herdcaller enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 green Dinosaur creature token with trample.

cards.flavor: "You think I stand alone? I have the forest at my call, the waters at my back. I outnumber you."
cards.name: Deeproot Elite
cards.text: Whenever another Merfolk enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on target Merfolk you control.

cards.name: Enter the Unknown
cards.text:
Target creature you control explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on the creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)
You may play an additional land this turn.

cards.name: Forerunner of the Heralds
cards.text:
When Forerunner of the Heralds enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Merfolk card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.
Whenever another Merfolk enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Forerunner of the Heralds.

cards.flavor: The earth walks, strongest of all.
cards.name: Ghalta, Primal Hunger
cards.text:
Ghalta, Primal Hunger costs {X} less to cast, where X is the total power of creatures you control.
Trample

cards.flavor: "The only gold I need is the sheltering shimmer of the trees."
cards.name: Giltgrove Stalker
cards.text: Giltgrove Stalker can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.

cards.flavor: For the Sun Empire, the Immortal Sun is a symbol of national identity. When they reclaim it, the Empire will flourish once more.
cards.name: Hardy Veteran
cards.text: As long as it's your turn, Hardy Veteran gets +0/+2.

cards.flavor:
"Death lizard approaching, cap'n!"
—Brint Doobin, last words
cards.name: Hunt the Weak
cards.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then that creature fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

cards.flavor: "Sisora wore this, who defeated the tyrant of Azcanta, and before her Natena of Vuhana's band. May it bring you their strength."
cards.name: Jade Bearer
cards.text: When Jade Bearer enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on another target Merfolk you control.

cards.flavor: "A blade is not fully forged until it is given."
cards.name: Jadecraft Artisan
cards.text: When Jadecraft Artisan enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

cards.name: Jadelight Ranger
cards.text: When Jadelight Ranger enters the battlefield, it explores, then it explores again. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard. Then repeat this process.)

cards.flavor: "We fought so long to hide this place. Let us be first to learn its wonders!"
cards.name: Jungleborn Pioneer
cards.text: When Jungleborn Pioneer enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 blue Merfolk creature token with hexproof. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

cards.flavor: "My whisper becomes a thousand roars."
cards.name: Knight of the Stampede
cards.text: Dinosaur spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.

cards.flavor:
"Better to let the sword go than to lose the arm with it."
—Captain Lannery Storm
cards.name: Naturalize
cards.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

cards.flavor: The frillbacks of Orazca soak up the sun on their tall spinal fins. They look slow and sleepy—until they catch the scent of prey.
cards.name: Orazca Frillback

cards.flavor: It embodies the riotous growth of the jungle, where creatures crowd upon creatures, where roots sprawl and vines swarm.
cards.name: Overgrown Armasaur
cards.text: Enrage — Whenever Overgrown Armasaur is dealt damage, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

cards.name: Path of Discovery
cards.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on the creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

cards.flavor:
"Still, the pterodon chasing the clouds from its skies must bow to the great forest below."
—Mahuiz, Sun Empire archer
cards.name: Plummet
cards.text: Destroy target creature with flying.

cards.flavor: An innumerable pack is concealed in a single reflection.
cards.name: Polyraptor
cards.text: Enrage — Whenever Polyraptor is dealt damage, create a token that's a copy of Polyraptor.

cards.flavor: The pack that ambushes, eviscerates, and devours together stays together.
cards.name: Strength of the Pack
cards.text: Put two +1/+1 counters on each creature you control.

cards.flavor: A warning shout would take too long.
cards.name: Swift Warden
cards.text:
Flash
When Swift Warden enters the battlefield, target Merfolk you control gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

cards.name: Tendershoot Dryad
cards.text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
At the beginning of each upkeep, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
Saprolings you control get +2/+2 as long as you have the city's blessing.

cards.flavor: It cares more about preserving the herd's territory than about preserving itself.
cards.name: Thrashing Brontodon
cards.text: {1}, Sacrifice Thrashing Brontodon: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

cards.flavor: The herds follow as new growth arises.
cards.name: Thunderherd Migration
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a Dinosaur card from your hand or pay {1}.
Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Wayward Swordtooth
cards.text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
You may play an additional land on each of your turns.
Wayward Swordtooth can't attack or block unless you have the city's blessing.

cards.flavor: "The Great River will not be tamed."
cards.name: World Shaper
cards.text:
Whenever World Shaper attacks, you may put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard.
When World Shaper dies, put all land cards from your graveyard onto the battlefield tapped.

cards.name: Angrath, the Flame-Chained
cards.text:
+1: Each opponent discards a card and loses 2 life.
−3: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step if it has converted mana cost 3 or less.
−8: Each opponent loses life equal to the number of cards in their graveyard.

cards.flavor: Streams of gold and bright feathers flash in the orb, visions of past and future.
cards.name: Atzocan Seer
cards.text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
Sacrifice Atzocan Seer: Return target Dinosaur card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Azor, the Lawbringer
cards.text:
Flying
When Azor, the Lawbringer enters the battlefield, each opponent can't cast instant or sorcery spells during that player's next turn.
Whenever Azor attacks, you may pay {X}{W}{U}{U}. If you do, you gain X life and draw X cards.

cards.name: Deadeye Brawler
cards.text:
Deathtouch
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
Whenever Deadeye Brawler deals combat damage to a player, if you have the city's blessing, draw a card.

cards.flavor: The buccaneers scaled the sides of buildings as easily as they boarded enemy ships.
cards.name: Dire Fleet Neckbreaker
cards.text: Attacking Pirates you control get +2/+0.

cards.flavor: Her centuries-long search is ended.
cards.name: Elenda, the Dusk Rose
cards.text:
Lifelink
Whenever another creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Elenda, the Dusk Rose.
When Elenda dies, create X 1/1 white Vampire creature tokens with lifelink, where X is Elenda's power.

cards.flavor: Hadana seeks power in the service of peace.
cards.name: Hadana's Climb
cards.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then if that creature has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, transform Hadana's Climb.

cards.name: Winged Temple of Orazca
cards.text:
(Transforms from Hadana's Climb.)
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{1}{G}{U}, {T}: Target creature you control gains flying and gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is its power.

cards.name: Huatli, Radiant Champion
cards.text:
+1: Put a loyalty counter on Huatli, Radiant Champion for each creature you control.
−1: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control.
−8: You get an emblem with "Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card."

cards.flavor: Every journey has its inevitable end . . .
cards.name: Journey to Eternity
cards.text:
Enchant creature you control
When enchanted creature dies, return it to the battlefield under your control, then return Journey to Eternity to the battlefield transformed under your control.

cards.flavor: . . . but every end is a new beginning.
cards.name: Atzal, Cave of Eternity
cards.text:
(Transforms from Journey to Eternity.)
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{3}{B}{G}, {T}: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

cards.flavor:
"You cannot kill it, not for long. It ripens where the ground is soaked with the blood of the slaughtered."
—Atiuru, priest of the Verdant Sun
cards.name: Jungle Creeper
cards.text: {3}{B}{G}: Return Jungle Creeper from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Kumena, Tyrant of Orazca
cards.text:
Tap another untapped Merfolk you control: Kumena, Tyrant of Orazca can't be blocked this turn.
Tap three untapped Merfolk you control: Draw a card.
Tap five untapped Merfolk you control: Put a +1/+1 counter on each Merfolk you control.

cards.flavor: "We long ago abandoned the things that make humans weak: friendship, marriage, family. All that remains is the strength of our devotion."
cards.name: Legion Lieutenant
cards.text: Other Vampires you control get +1/+1.

cards.flavor:
"The mist clothes us when we are bare, hides us when we are alone, and unites us when we are together."
—Nirit of Pashona's band
cards.name: Merfolk Mistbinder
cards.text: Other Merfolk you control get +1/+1.

cards.name: Path of Mettle
cards.text:
When Path of Mettle enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to each creature that doesn't have first strike, double strike, vigilance, or haste.
Whenever you attack with at least two creatures that have first strike, double strike, vigilance, and/or haste, transform Path of Mettle.

cards.name: Metzali, Tower of Triumph
cards.text:
(Transforms from Path of Mettle.)
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{1}{R}, {T}: Metzali, Tower of Triumph deals 2 damage to each opponent.
{2}{W}, {T}: Choose a creature at random that attacked this turn. Destroy that creature.

cards.flavor: Vona sought a conqueror. Mavren sought a savior. Both found what they sought . . .
cards.name: Profane Procession
cards.text: {3}{W}{B}: Exile target creature. Then if there are three or more cards exiled with Profane Procession, transform it.

cards.flavor: . . . resting in the splendor of the dead.
cards.name: Tomb of the Dusk Rose
cards.text:
(Transforms from Profane Procession.)
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{2}{W}{B}, {T}: Put a creature card exiled with this permanent onto the battlefield under your control.

cards.flavor: Imitation is the sincerest form of piracy.
cards.name: Protean Raider
cards.text: Raid — If you attacked with a creature this turn, you may have Protean Raider enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield.

cards.flavor: Its breath is a gale. Its roar is a volcano. Its anger tears soul from flesh.
cards.name: Raging Regisaur
cards.text: Whenever Raging Regisaur attacks, it deals 1 damage to any target.

cards.flavor: As the battle for Orazca unfolded, the contenders discovered that others had already staked a claim.
cards.name: Relentless Raptor
cards.text:
Vigilance
Relentless Raptor attacks or blocks each combat if able.

cards.name: Resplendent Griffin
cards.text:
Flying
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
Whenever Resplendent Griffin attacks, if you have the city's blessing, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

cards.flavor: To a siegehorn, there is no such thing as a dead end.
cards.name: Siegehorn Ceratops
cards.text: Enrage — Whenever Siegehorn Ceratops is dealt damage, put two +1/+1 counters on it. (It must survive the damage to get the counters.)

cards.flavor:
"Charge like a red-hot cannonball straight to your target. You slow down, you sink."
—Captain Lannery Storm
cards.name: Storm Fleet Sprinter
cards.text:
Haste
Storm Fleet Sprinter can't be blocked.

cards.name: Storm the Vault
cards.text:
Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color."
At the beginning of your end step, if you control five or more artifacts, transform Storm the Vault.

cards.flavor: Swimming in coins proved harder than they'd hoped, but dancing was a jingling delight.
cards.name: Vault of Catlacan
cards.text:
(Transforms from Storm the Vault.)
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{T}: Add {U} for each artifact you control.

cards.name: Zacama, Primal Calamity
cards.text:
Vigilance, reach, trample
When Zacama, Primal Calamity enters the battlefield, if you cast it, untap all lands you control.
{2}{R}: Zacama deals 3 damage to target creature.
{2}{G}: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
{2}{W}: You gain 3 life.

cards.flavor:
"The fools have done it."
—Tishana
cards.name: Awakened Amalgam
cards.text: Awakened Amalgam's power and toughness are each equal to the number of differently named lands you control.

cards.name: Azor's Gateway
cards.text: {1}, {T}: Draw a card, then exile a card from your hand. If cards with five or more different converted mana costs are exiled with Azor's Gateway, you gain 5 life, untap Azor's Gateway, and transform it.

cards.flavor: As soon as Jace laid eyes on the great sphinx's chamber, the shards of memory began sliding into place.
cards.name: Sanctum of the Sun
cards.text:
(Transforms from Azor's Gateway.)
{T}: Add X mana of any one color, where X is your life total.

cards.name: Captain's Hook

cards.flavor:
"Gold without freedom might as well be lead."
—Angrath
cards.name: Gleaming Barrier
cards.text:
Defender
When Gleaming Barrier dies, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color."

cards.name: Golden Guardian
cards.text:
Defender
{2}: Golden Guardian fights another target creature you control. When Golden Guardian dies this turn, return it to the battlefield transformed under your control.

cards.flavor: An army of living gold for the golden city.
cards.name: Gold-Forge Garrison
cards.text:
(Transforms from Golden Guardian.)
{T}: Add two mana of any one color.
{4}, {T}: Create a 4/4 colorless Golem artifact creature token.

cards.name: The Immortal Sun
cards.text:
Players can't activate planeswalkers' loyalty abilities.
At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card.
Spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Creatures you control get +1/+1.

cards.name: Orazca Relic
cards.text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Sacrifice Orazca Relic: You gain 3 life and draw a card. Activate this ability only if you have the city's blessing.

cards.flavor: Made to ward off the Grim Captain and silence the lure of undeath.
cards.name: Silent Gravestone
cards.text:
Cards in graveyards can't be the targets of spells or abilities.
{4}, {T}: Exile Silent Gravestone and all cards from all graveyards. Draw a card.

cards.flavor:
"Because the giant, implacable death lizard wasn't scary enough already."
—Captain Brinely Rage
cards.name: Strider Harness
cards.text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has haste.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

cards.flavor:
"The best kind of treasure is the kind that leads to more treasure!"
—Captain Lannery Storm
cards.name: Traveler's Amulet
cards.text: {1}, Sacrifice Traveler's Amulet: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Arch of Orazca
cards.text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
{T}: Add {C}.
{5}, {T}: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if you have the city's blessing.

cards.flavor: The Sun Empire bends nature—rivers, mountainsides, dinosaurs—to its unyielding will.
cards.name: Evolving Wilds
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

cards.flavor: In the galleon's grand cathedral, conquistadors swore vows of faith. In its wreckage, they swore vows of revenge.
cards.name: Forsaken Sanctuary
cards.text:
Forsaken Sanctuary enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.

cards.flavor: The stench of rotting meat lures flies, goblins, and young raptors.
cards.name: Foul Orchard
cards.text:
Foul Orchard enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {G}.

cards.flavor:
"A place like this makes me wonder if there's more to life than blood and treasure . . . Nah."
—Boyl Bucksalt, Storm Fleet swab
cards.name: Highland Lake
cards.text:
Highland Lake enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {R}.

cards.flavor: The Sun Empire's cities are built from the bones of the earth.
cards.name: Stone Quarry
cards.text:
Stone Quarry enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.

cards.flavor: Countless streams flow into the nine rivers, and the nine rivers flow into the Great River. The River Heralds guard them all.
cards.name: Woodland Stream
cards.text:
Woodland Stream enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.

cards.name: Vraska, Scheming Gorgon
cards.text:
+2: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
−3: Destroy target creature.
−10: Until end of turn, creatures you control gain deathtouch and "Whenever this creature deals damage to an opponent, that player loses the game."

cards.flavor: "These pirates must answer for their ancestors, who renounced the Church of Dusk and sailed from Torrezon as heretics."
cards.name: Vampire Champion
cards.text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

cards.flavor: Abandoning both queen and church, he chose to follow power.
cards.name: Vraska's Conquistador
cards.text: Whenever Vraska's Conquistador attacks or blocks, if you control a Vraska planeswalker, target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

cards.name: Vraska's Scorn
cards.text: Target opponent loses 4 life. You may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Vraska, Scheming Gorgon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.

cards.name: Angrath, Minotaur Pirate
cards.text:
+2: Angrath, Minotaur Pirate deals 1 damage to target opponent or planeswalker and each creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls.
−3: Return target Pirate card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
−11: Destroy all creatures target opponent controls. Angrath, Minotaur Pirate deals damage to that player equal to their total power.

cards.flavor: Orcs have been enemies of the Legion of Dusk since it was formed, and the entire race has been declared anathema.
cards.name: Angrath's Ambusher
cards.text: Angrath's Ambusher gets +2/+0 as long as you control an Angrath planeswalker.

cards.flavor: Though small, goblins can hold their own in a fight. Foolhardy confidence goes a long way.
cards.name: Swab Goblin
Angrath's Fury
cards.text: Destroy target creature. Angrath's Fury deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker. You may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Angrath, Minotaur Pirate, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.

cards.flavor:
"Burn their fleet to the waterline, and sink whatever's left."
—Angrath
cards.name: Cinder Barrens
cards.text:
Cinder Barrens enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.
